name: Robots
overview: This game features Rodney Copperbottom as the playable main character. You can also play as the Wonderbot and Bigweld in the chase scene. Rodney can invent different devices by collecting a certain amount of blueprints scattered throughout the environment. It also features specials including for one example, wrenches from Bigweld and some challenges. All of them can be used to fight bad robots.
